Package it.polimi.ingsw.jsonUtilities

Class GsonHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.jsonUtilities.GsonHandler
public class GsonHandler extends Object
Class that expose static methods used for better build the GsonBuilder, to create the Gson object just call on the returned object .create()
See Also:
GsonBuilder

    • cToSMessageConfig

      public static com.google.gson.GsonBuilder cToSMessageConfig​(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder builder)
      returns a gson builder ready to parse a Message object from Client to Server. Remember to use toJson() with one extra parameter indicating the class Message when you are serializing a message.
      Parameters:
      builder - a generic GsonBuilder
      Returns:
      a gson builder ready to parse a Message object from Client to Server

    • sToCMessageConfig

      public static com.google.gson.GsonBuilder sToCMessageConfig​(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder builder)
      returns a gson builder ready to parse a Message object from Server to Client. Remember to use toJson() with one extra parameter indicating the class Message when you are serializing a message.
      Parameters:
      builder - a generic GsonBuilder
      Returns:
      a gson builder ready to parse a Message object from Server to Client
